Sorry.

Polar Claw <cycodrone@...> wrote:Are you reading halfthe OOC posts I've sent giving you
vital info cause somehow i doubt it. I mean Rattrap's
father who stands about 30' tall and looks exactly how
he did when he was alive before and in the same area
as Nightlight, yet you totally had him ignore
Shadowcaster. The same applies to your other BW
characters who fought alongside Shadowcaster and
should clearly remember him dying valiantly while
disabling the Nemesis. I'd advise you to check out the
Posts 'Shadowcaster' and 'A Hero reborn'.
